mapper.select: SELECT SUM( withdrawal_amount ) AS withdrawalAmount FROM t_withdrawal_record_details WHERE withdrawal_record_id = #{withdrawalRecordId}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN create_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) * 1000 THEN withdrawal_amount ELSE 0 END) AS todayWithdrawalAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN create_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 1000 AND create_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE) * 1000 THEN withdrawal_amount ELSE 0 END) AS yesterdayWithdrawalAmount, SUM(withdrawal_amount) AS totalWithdrawalAmount FROM t_withdrawal_record_details w WHERE w.agent_code = #{agentCode}

SELECT sys_user_id as userId, SUM( withdrawal_amount ) AS balance, SUM( CASE WHEN amount_type = 1 THEN withdrawal_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS depositAmount, SUM( CASE WHEN amount_type = 0 THEN withdrawal_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS withdrawalAmount FROM t_withdrawal_record_details WHERE sys_user_id = #{userId}
